name: Fotrux Fighters (Demo)
description:
UPDATE - v0.1.1

CHANGELOG

- Build up speed when sliding off a ramp.

- Decreases speed after sliding down a ramp.

- Missiles now collide with map.

What is the game about?

Fotrux Fighters is a game where you parkour your way out of being chased by missiles. You can also fight back against the turrets by throwing knives or you can take the safe aproach and use a force field as shield.

Parkour Guide

Basic Movement

Walking - Press WASD to walk.

Jumping - Press SPACE to jump.

Sprinting - Press WASD while holding SHIFT to sprint.

Crouching - Press WASD while holding C to crouch.

Sliding- Press WASD while holding LEFT CONTROL to slide.

Wall Movement

Wall Climbing - Run straight at a wall to wall climb.

Wallrunning - Run parallel against a wall to wallrun. 

(you can jump of a wall while wallrunning by pressing SPACE and you can wallrun upwards by pressing LEFT SHIFT and wallrun downwards by pressing LEFT CONTROL.)

Ledge Grabbing - Get close to a ledge (small cube on a wall) and you will automatically hold on to the ledge. 

(You can  jump in any direction just by looking in that direction and pressing SPACE.)

Dashing

Dashing - Press E and WASD to dash in a direction or press E and SPACE to dash upwards.

Combat

Throw Knives - Click the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to throw a knive.

Force Field - Click the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to activate the force field shield (it does slowly drain your health, but if you use it wisely, you can time it right and stop the missiles).

You have to throw 5 knives in the middle of the turret to fully kill the turret (the red glowing part). Once you have defeated the turret, you can reset the scene by pressing the MINUS key.

In Scene

You can press MINUS to reset the scene.

You can quit the game by pressing ESCAPE.
